ref.mixed-citation: Intergovernmental Panel on climate Change (IPCC), “Summary for policymakers: Global warming of 1.5 °C—An IPCC Special Report on the impacts of global warming of 1.5 °C above pre-industrial levels and related global greenhouse gas emission pathways, in the context of strengthening the global response to the threat of climate change, sustainable development, and eforts to eradicate poverty”, V. Masson-Delmotte et al., Eds, www.ipcc.ch/report/sr15 (IPCC, World Meteorological Organization, United Nations Environment Programme, Geneva, Switzerland, 2018).
